Question: This so enthused this person that he subscribed financially to the next project to build a manned hydrogen balloon.
Hints: At age 17, this person ran away to Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, seeking a new start in a new city.
In 1730, at the age of 24, this person publicly acknowledged an illegitimate son named William, and raised him in his household.
As he matured, this person began to concern himself more with public affairs.
